content: Is there an existing method to express endpoint adjudication of clinical trial data (e.g., by local or central adjudication committees) for regulators (FDA, EMA, etc.)? For example, an adjudication by a Practioner as part of a ResearchStudy for a ResearchSubject relating to an AdverseEvent, MedicationAdministration, Observation, etc. Thanks in advance!
You might want to ask this on #research
